msg.msgText: Destination mapping rule {0}. Queue manager connection {1}. Unable to subscribe to WebSphere MQ topic {2}. Subscription name {3}. MQSUB Reason {4}.

msgExplanation.p: A failure occurred while attempting to subscribe to a WebSphere MQ topic.

msgUserResponse.p: Use the reason code shown in the message to determine the cause of the failure and take appropriate action to rectify the problem.
